name: Duel (itch) (TristanChan)
description:
I made this game for the Trijam #125 game jam with the theme of one enemy only. I went a bit over the limit of 3 hours and spent 4 so I could make the BGM and a few final touches. You play as a samurai caught up in an intense 1v1 duel. Use the arrow keys or W,A,D to block the attacks of your assassin then strike back with the spacebar or LMB. F11 for fullscreen.

Premade assets:

Background was from this: https://kronbits.itch.io/backgrounds

I used this to pixelate the background: https://kronbits.itch.io/pixatool

And most of the sound effects are from this: https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle
